00026 template< typename Container>
00027 void erAlignementSegmentContour( Container &seg)
00028 {
00029   typename Container::iterator itseg, itseg_chain;
00030   Container seg_chain;
00031   itseg = seg.begin( );
00032   seg_chain.push_back( *itseg);
00033   do 
00034     { 
00035       itseg_chain = erFindCgalSegment( seg.begin( ), seg.end( ), (seg_chain.end( ))->target); 
00036       seg_chain.push_back( *itseg_chain);
00037     }
00038   while( itseg_chain->target == itseg->source);
00039   seg = seg_chain;
00040 };

00071 template< typename Iterator>
00072 Iterator erFindCgalSegment( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CgalPoint punto)
00073 {
00074   while( p1 != p2)
00075     {
00076       if( ( p1->source).operator == (punto))
00077         {
00078           return p1;
00079           break;
00080         }
00081       if( ( p1->target).operator == (punto))
00082         {
00083           *p1 = *p1.opposite;
00084           return p1;
00085           break;
00086         }
00087       p1++;
00088     }
00089   return p2;
00090 };
00091

00093 template< typename Iterator>
00094 Iterator erFindCgalPoint( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CgalPoint punto)
00095 {
00096   while( p1 != p2)
00097     {
00098       if( p1.operator == (punto))
00099         {
00100           return p1;
00101           break;
00102         }
00103       p1++;
00104     }
00105   return p2;
00106 };
